text:
Alright,
that’s it for today’s lesson, good job.

You can still use the lesson room, you know?
Aren’t you going to do any extra practice?

Huh?
Didn’t you just say the lesson was over?

Then, it’s fine if we leave!
I’ve pretty much got it down!

If it were just me, I might have
ended the lesson half-heartedly......

Not you, Mei......
You wouldn’t do that, right?

No, no, no, the old me
was super half-hearted! It’s totally possible!

......Honestly, I’m really glad I met Asahi-chan and
Fuyuko-chan...... Of course, you too, Producer.

Being in the same unit with everyone now,
I think that’s the best "miracle" that’s happened to me.

......Producer,
do you have some time after work today?

Then, can you come with me?
There’s a place I want to go──......

The place where you and I met,
......where our "miracle" began.
